mapper.select: SELECT DB.ISBN13,DB.DEBATE_ID,B.COVER,B.TITLE,D.OUTLINE, TO_CHAR(D.DEBATE_START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(D.DEBATE_END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS DEBATE_END_DATE FROM TBL_DEBATE D LEFT JOIN TBL_DEBATE_BOOK DB ON D.DEBATE_ID=DB.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_BOOK B on B.ISBN13 = DB.ISBN13 WHERE D.DEBATE_ID=#{debateId}

SELECT DB.NOTICE_ID,D.DEBATE_ID,DB.TITLE,DB.OPINION,TO_CHAR(DB.NOTICE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS NOTICE_DATE, DB.MEMBER_ID,M.NICKNAME,P.PROFILE_UUID,P.PROFILE_UPLOAD FROM TBL_DEBATE_BOARD DB LEFT JOIN TBL_DEBATE D ON D.DEBATE_ID = DB.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER_DEBATE MD ON D.DEBATE_ID=MD.DEBATE_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON DB.MEMBER_ID=M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PROFILE P ON M.MEMBER_ID=P.MEMBER_ID WHERE DB.DEBATE_ID=#{debateId} ORDER BY NOTICE_ID DESC

SELECT DC.NOTICE_ID,M.MEMBER_ID,DC.COMMENT_ID,DC.DEBATE_COMMENT,TO_CHAR(DC.COMMENT_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')AS COMMENT_DATE, M.NICKNAME,P.PROFILE_UUID,P.PROFILE_UPLOAD FROM TBL_DEBATE_BOARD DB LEFT JOIN TBL_DEBATE_COMMENT DC ON DB.NOTICE_ID=DC.NOTICE_ID JOIN TBL_MEMBER M ON DC.MEMBER_ID=M.MEMBER_ID LEFT JOIN TBL_PROFILE P ON M.MEMBER_ID=P.MEMBER_ID WHERE DC.NOTICE_ID=#{noticeId} ORDER BY COMMENT_ID DESC
